meanings.definition: Characterized by or requiring a sitting posture.
meanings.sent1: Her sedentary job at the desk made her back ache.
meanings.sent2: The doctor advised him to avoid a sedentary lifestyle to stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: The sedentary cat refused to budge from its favorite spot on the couch.
meanings.sent4: The sedentary clouds hung low in the sky, unmoving and peaceful.
meanings.sent5: The sedentary nature of the sloth is well-known, as it spends most of its time hanging from trees.

meanings.sent1: The sedentary rock sat undisturbed in the garden for years.
meanings.sent2: After a long day of work, he preferred a sedentary evening on the sofa.
meanings.sent3: The sedentary remote control seemed to have grown roots on the coffee table.
meanings.sent4: The sedentary lake reflected the stillness of the surrounding mountains.
meanings.sent5: The sedentary caterpillar remained motionless on the leaf, waiting to transform into a butterfly.
